Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: COST General Conference LOCREF IS1207 WG1 External POST NPM: Public >Services, Potsdam, contribuzione di paper: ««Still fragmentation?» Public utilities and social services in Italy after post-NPM reforms», con Giulio Citroni e Stefania Profeti

ecpr General Conference – Potsdam, Section title: Policy evaluation in the public sector, Panel title: Evaluation of territorial and functional reform policies in the intergovernmental setting, Panel chair: Hellmut Wollmann and Sabine Kuhlmann, Humboldt University Berlin, Paper giver: Andrea Lippi, University of Firenze, Discussant: Thomas Widmer, University of Zurich, «Assessing decentralization in Italy between political system and democratic accountability.»

ECPR General Conference in Reykjavik, August 25-27, 2011 SECTION 74 - DEMOCRATIC INNOVATIONS PANEL 250 DEMOCRATIC INNOVATIONS AND THE OLIGARCHISATION OF LOCAL DEMOCRACY THROUGH PUBLIC UTILITIES AND OTHER TENDENCIES, Chairs: Carsten HERZBERG (herzberg@soz.uni-frankfurt.de); Yves SINTOMER (sy@cmb.hu-berlin.de), Title: «Representation through Corporatisation. Public Utilities as Arenas for Local Democracy: Emerging Oligarchy and Unintended Consequences in Italy», contrinbuto con Giulio Citroni e Stefania Profeti

INTERNATIONAL POLITICAL SCIENCE ASSOCIATION gENERAL CONFERENCE MADRID IPSA CONGRESS – MADRID 2012 PANEL: PROVISION OF PUBLIC SERVICES: FROM PUBLIC/MUNICIPAL DELIVERY TO PRIVATIZATION (AND REVERSE TO "RE-MUNICIPALISATION"?) Chair: Prof. Hellmut Wollmann; Co-Chair: prof Harald Baldersheim, Discussants: Mr. Jens Libbe, CONTRIBUTO DAL TITOLO: «PRIVATE GOVERNMENT WITH PUBLIC MONEY. MUNICIPAL CORPORATIONS AND PUBLIC UTILITIES IN SIX ITALIANS REGIONS, CON GIULIO CITRONI E STEFANIA PROFETI

1st ICPP Conference Grenoble 2013, Panel: Policy Design : principles and processes, Chair: Michael Howlett, S. Fraser Univ. Session 3: Policy design: theory and concepts, Chair: Per-Ola Aberg; Discussant : Elisa Chelle, CONTRIBUTO CON G.CAPANO: «Enlightening policy mix complexity: a typology of actors’ choice »
COST MEETING WG1 Parigi External post NPM: Local Public services, presentazione cotnributo: «Local public services in Italy:Still fragmentation», con Giulio Citroni e Stefania Profeti

International Conference on Public Policy, Milano - presentazione paper nella sezione T02P18 - Policy Making at the Center of Government : Center ing and Decenter ing Dynamics in Comparat ive Perspect ive; Chairs: Jonathan Craft, University of Toronto, Jonathan.craft@utoronto.ca; B. Guy Peters, University of Pittsburgh, bgpeters@pitt.edu; titolo: «A laboratory for the disorder?» Never-ending de-centering and re-centering in intergovernmental relations in the Italian case

COST Conference LOCREF IS1207 a Istanbul, presentazione paper: «The design and the effects of the introduction of regulatory governance in Italian Local Public Utilities. An assessment on water, waste and public transport at macro and micro level.» con Giulio Citroni (University of Calabria), Marco Di Giulio, (University of Bologna-Forlì), Maria Tullia Galanti, (University of Milan), Andrea Lippi (University of Florence) Stefania Profeti, (University of Bologna)

24thWorld Congress of Political Science , Poznań, Poland , RC05 Comparative Studies on Local Government and Politics Central and Local Governments' Relations: Institutional Reforms and Political Competition, contributo dal titolo: «The Trilateral Game. Intergovernmental Relations and Re-adjustments after the 2014–2016 Reforms in Italy », con Silvia Bolgherini, University of Naples Federico II e Marco Di Giulio, University of Macerata, Andrea Lippi, University of Florence

Eyropean Group for Public Administration, EGPA General Conference Utrecht 24-26 agosto 2016, presentazione di un contributo con Theodore Tsekos (Institute for Technology, Kalamata, Grecia) nel Panel V Local Governance «Local Public Services in Times of Austerity in the Mediterranean Countries as a Case of ‘Glocalization’»

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: PROGRAMMA «PUBBLICO E PRIVATO NEL GOVERNO DELLA CITTA'» CITYGOV FINANZIAMENTO POR CREO ESF-REGIONE TOSCANA PER 2 BORSE DI STUDIO PER GIOVANI RICERCATORI DIRETTORE DELLA RICERCA ANDREA LIPPI, FINANZIAMENTO EURO 300.000

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Membro del collegio di dottorato Political Science, European Politics and International Relations PEI - Consorzio tra Scuola Superiore Sant'Anna, Università di Pisa, Università di Siena e Università di Firenze. Supervisor di una tesi di dottorato per il triennio 2015-2017 sul te,a dei gruppi di interesse nelle politiche europee. Docente a seminari di Compared Local Government

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: EACEA Programma Jean Monnet 2013 KA1 Making European Policy Making Effective and Useful (MAKE EU), euro 18.500

Direttore del Centro interunuversitario di ricerca sul sud europa (CIRES) tra gli atenei di Firenze, Pisa e Siena- 2 mandati: 2010-2013 e 2014-2016. in allegato verbale primo mandato quando il centro aveva autonomia finanziaria. dal 1.1.2014 il CIRES in ottemperanza alle disposizioni della L.140/2010 non ha piu autonomia finanziaria e afferisce al Builancio Unico di Ateneo.
REPRESENTATIVE COUNTRY MEMBER OF MANAGEMENT COMMITEE- ITALy in COST ACTION IS1207 LOCREF Local Public Sector Reforms: An International Comparison
